item.title: Perth
item.description: Our offline app for HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Transperth「Transperth Zone Map」 https://www.transperth.wa.gov.au/Portals/0/Asset/Documents/Tickets%20&%20Fares/Transperth_zone_map.pdf Transperth「Timetable Results」 https://www.transperth.wa.gov.au/timetables/results?bus= Transperth「Stations & Maps」 https://www.transperth.wa.gov.au/Using-Transperth/Station-Facilities/Stations-Maps Transperth「Timetable Results」 https://www.transperth.wa.gov.au/timetables/results?train= Aussie Trains https://aussietrains.com.au/indian-pacific-2023-fares FERRY TIMETABLE https://www.transperth.wa.gov.au/Timetables/Details/ferry/ferry Tips SmartRider https://www.transperth.wa.gov.au/SmartRider/Types-of-SmartRider Apps Offline map & travel guide: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mytripnavi.app.perth Transperth https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=au.gov.wa.pta.transperth DiDi https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.didiglobal.passenger Ola Cabs https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.olacabs.customer Perth Airport Departure and Arrival Flights https://www.perthairport.com.au/flights/departures-and-arrivals https://www.perthairport.com.au/at-the-airport/which-terminal Transit guide-Connecting flights Getting to the Airport https://www.perthairport.com.au/to-and-from-the-airport/transport-options/public-transport Airport map https://www.perthairport.com.au/to-and-from-the-airport/airport-maps https://www.perthairport.com.au/at-the-airport/terminal-maps Transfer between terminals https://www.

item.title: Macau

item.title: Ottawa
item.description: Our offline app for HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Maps https://www.octranspo.com/en/plan-your-trip/ Travel Planner https://plan.octranspo.com/plan Tips Offline map guide https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mytripnavi.app.ottawa Transit • Subway & Bus Times https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thetransitapp.droid PRESTO card https://www.prestocard.ca/ Ottawa International Airport (YOW) Departure and Arrival Flights Departure flight information https://yow.ca/en/flights/departures Arriving flights https://yow.ca/en/flights/arrivals Transit guide-Connecting flights Getting to the Airport https://yow.ca/en/parking-transportation/ground-transportation-options Airport map https://yow.ca/en/travel-planning/terminal-maps Transfer between terminals Shop, Dine, Relax and do more Dining https://yow.ca/en/services/restaurants Shop https://yow.

item.title: Whistler
item.description: Our offline app for HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Whistler bus schedules and maps https://www.bctransit.com/whistler/schedules-and-maps Shuttle Bus https://www.whistler.com/getting-here/road/shuttle/ Taxi Whistle! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.whistle.shuttle.passenger Tips Offline map guide https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mytripnavi.app.whistler Transit • Subway & Bus Times https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thetransitapp.droid Whistler Airport There is no Whistler Airport. If you’re coming to Whistler, you’ll almost certainly fly into Vancouver International Airport (YVR). It’s the closest international airport and is a hub that serves over 45 airlines and has nonstop flights to over 110 destinations worldwide.

item.title: Vancouver
item.description: Our offline app for HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Interactive System Map https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/interactive-system-map Trip Planner https://tripplanning.translink.ca/#/app/tripplanning TransLink「Complete Metro Vancouver Transit System Map」 https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/bus-schedules TransLink「SkyTrain Schedules」 https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/skytrain TransLink「West Coast Express Schedules」 https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/west-coast-express VIA-RAIL「Explore Canada by Train」 https://www.viarail.ca/en/explore-our-destinations/trains ransLink「SeaBus Schedules」 https://www.translink.ca/schedules-and-maps/seabus FALSE CREEK FERRIES「Plan Your Trip」 https://granvilleislandferries.bc.ca/plan-your-trip/ Aquabus「Plan Your Trip with the Aquabus Granville Island False Creek Ferry」 https://theaquabus.com/ BC Ferries「Explore our routes」 https://www.bcferries.com/routes-fares/discover-route-map Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.

item.title: Chicago
item.description: Our offline app for Chicago HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation CTA「Schedules & routes」 https://www.transitchicago.com/schedules/ Metra Rail https://ridertools.metrarail.com/maps-schedules/system-map Chicago Water Taxi「Connecting Chicago」 https://www.chicagowatertaxi.com/ Shoreline Sightseeing「Shoreline Water Taxis」 https://shorelinewatertaxi.com/ Divvy Bikes https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.motivateco.chicagoapp Tips Ventra Card Ventra is an electronic fare payment system for Regional Transportation Authority which replaced the Chicago Card and the Transit Card automated fare collection systems. Ventra is the convenient fare payment system for CTA, Pace and Metra that allows customers to pay for train and bus rides throughout Chicagoland.

item.title: San Diego
item.description: Our offline app for HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Maps and Schedules https://www.sdmts.com/getting-around/maps-and-schedules All bus routes https://www.sdmts.com/transit-services/bus-routes Trolley https://www.sdmts.com/transit-services/trolley Trip Planner https://www.sdmts.com/getting-around/trip-planner BREEZE Bus https://gonctd.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/NCTD-System-Map-April-2023-w.pdf COASTER https://gonctd.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/COASTER-Schedule-Flyer-April-3-2023.pdf SPRINTER https://gonctd.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/SPRINTER-Schedule-April-2-2023.pdf AMTRAK「The Amtrak Network」 https://www.amtrak.com/home.html Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Tips PRONTO Card Pronto, stylized as PRONTO, is the second-generation contactless payment system for automated fare collection on public transit services in San Diego County, California. https://www.ridepronto.com/ https://www.

item.title: Los Angeles
item.description: Our offline app for Los Angeles HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation https://www.metro.net/riding/guide/system-maps/ Metro「Bus and Rail System detail」 https://cdn.beta.metro.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/03165615/bus-rail-system-detail.pdf LADOT Transit「DASH System Map」 https://www.ladottransit.com/map/sysmap_dash.pdf Big Blue Bus「SYSTEM MAP」 https://www.bigbluebus.com/routes-and-schedules/ Culver CityBus「Bus Schedules」 https://www.culvercitybus.com/Bus-Schedules BRT：Bus Rapid Transit https://www.metro.net/riding/schedules/ https://cdn.beta.metro.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/03165615/bus-rail-system-detail.pdf FLYAWAY https://www.flylax.com/flyaway-bus Metro「Maps & Schedules」 https://www.metro.net/riding/schedules/ METROLINK「SCHEDULES」 https://metrolinktrains.com/rider-info/general-info/maps/ AMTRAK「The Amtrak Network」 https://www.amtrak.com/home.html Ferry-Catalina Express「Maps」 https://www.catalinaexpress.com/schedule-fares.html Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Metro Bike Share https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bicycletransit.MetroBikeShare Tips TAP card The Transit Access Pass is a contactless smart card used for automated fare collection on most public transport services within Los Angeles County, California.

item.title: San Francisco
item.description: Our offline app for HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation SFMTA「Muni Service Map」 https://www.sfmta.com/maps/muni-service-map BART「Schedules」 https://www.bart.gov/sites/default/files/docs/BARTDetailedMapWeb.pdf SFMTA「Muni Metro Map」 https://www.sfmta.com/maps/muni-metro-map San Francisco Bay Ferry「Routes & Schedules」 https://sanfranciscobayferry.com/routes-and-schedules Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Tips Clipper Card: Clipper is the all-in-one transit card used for contactless fare payments throughout the San Francisco Bay Area. https://www.clippercard.com/ClipperWeb/ Clipper customers get discounts on one-way fares of 50 cents for adults, 25 cents for youth and 19 cents for senior and disabled riders.

item.title: Seattle
item.description: Our offline app for Seattle HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation The system maps include information on key destinations, landmarks and connecting services and transfer points in 5 areas of King County. All Schedule and Map could be found and download from here. https://kingcounty.gov/en/dept/metro/routes-and-service/schedules-and-maps Northwest area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-nw Northeast area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-ne Central area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-central Southwest area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-sw Southeast area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-se Kings County Metro https://kingcounty.gov/~/media/depts/metro/maps/seattle/09172022/pdf/downtown-seattle-frequency-geo-map.pdf RapidRide https://kingcounty.gov/en/dept/metro/routes-and-service/schedules-and-maps#rapidride-1 Sound Transit current service https://www.

CharlieCards are available at fare vending machines in most subway stations.

item.title: Rome
item.description: Our offline app HERE Public transportation Find the route Use Google Map to find the route. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.maps&hl=en&gl=US Inside Rome, use metro and bus. https://www.atac.roma.it/utility/mappe Outside Rome or taxi Use Free Now or Uber. Free Now is much cheaper. Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=taxi.android.client iPhone: https://apps.apple.com/US/app/id357852748?mt=8 You can find FreeNow option in Google Map search below all other options. From/to airport Fiumicino Aeroporto Use fast train (RV/REG) by Trenitalia (8~14 Euro) or SIT Bus Shuttle (~7 Euro) or Free Now taxi (~50 Euro).

item.title: Moscow
item.description: Our offline app for Moscow HERE Metro map https://mosmetro.ru/metro-map/ https://transport.mos.ru/common/upload/docs/map/s.pdf Tram http://none.ru/files/mostram_map.pdf Bus https://static.urbica.co/projects/longread/img/magistral.pdf Airport https://www.svo.aero/en/main Russia foods you must try Famous foods top 5 Сельдь под шубой (Dressed herring): Dressed herring, colloquially known as herring under a fur coat, is a layered salad composed of diced pickled herring covered with layers of grated boiled eggs, vegetables, chopped onions, and mayonnaise. Some variations of this dish include a layer of fresh grated apple while some do not.

item.title: Oslo
item.description: Our offline app for Oslo HERE Public transport Ruter Provides tickets and schedules for all public transport within Oslo. Find trams (trikk), subways (T-bane), ferries (ferge), local trains (lokaltog) and busses (buss) on the website or in the Ruter app. You can also buy travelcards and tickets in some kiosks (Narvesen, 7-Eleven, Deli de Luca and Mix). Go to ruter.no Entur Entur finds journeys across all transport options in all cities in Norway.

Bonjour RATP app Preparing your trip to Paris: hours of operation Weekdays, the metro operates from 5:30 a.m. to about 1:15 a.m. On Friday and Saturday evenings, as well as on the eve of bank holidays, trains run until about 2:15 a.

item.title: Dubai
item.description: Our offline app for Dubai HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Metro: The Red Line (which has stations at or near most of the major tourist destinations and along The Sheikh Zayed Road), and The Green Line (which has stations along the residential part of the city). Red Line: Runs from Rashidiya to UAE Exchange. Green Line: Connects Etisalat to Creek. Route planner https://www.rta.ae/wps/portal/rta/ae/public-transport/journeyplanner Dubai Tram:The Dubai Tram links the Dubai Metro and the Palm Monorail, making it convenient for you to explore the restaurants and attractions in the JBR district and Palm Jumeirah.

item.title: Taipei
item.description: Our offline app for Taipei HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Type of transportation: MRT, LRT, Bus, Taxi, Uber, Bike Type of MRT tickets: Admission to the trains is via blue plastic single-journey tokens or electronic stored value cards called EasyCards. Travelers can calculate single journey fare here, which depends on journey distance. Single Journey: NT$20 - NT$65 One-day EasyCards Pass: NT$150 24hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$180 48hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$280 72hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$380 All Pass Ticket: NT$1,280 includes unlimited rides for 30 days on Taipei Metro, Taipei buses, and YouBike bike share.
